Summary: Bright light with a light green tail
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving down the highway when all of a sudden there was this flash, it was right out of bakersfield and into the grapevine. we had our car break down and while we were there this cigarette shaped thing flew over our heads slowly making a humming noise it stopped for about two secods 450ft or so above our heads so we saw it clearly and then it gained speed and it must have been going past mach 3 and left us within 7 seconds after we had seen it above us. When it sped off is when we saw the green light, before that we noticed it because of the flash but afterwards could only see it was a measly almost reflection glint of metal from the moon and some streetlights. we took pictures of this ufo and left our disposable camera in the car. we stayed at the travel lodge near the airport and the next morning when we woke up, our car with the camera had been stolen. coincednece or not we arent sure, but we ne3ver found our car, and nonetheless it proved to be a firghtening experience.
